Trade/Device Name(s): Healgen Secobarbital Test (Strip, Cassette, Cup, Dip Card)
Healgen Buprenorphine Test (Strip, Cassette, Cup, Dip Card)
Healgen Methadone Test (Strip, Cassette, Cup, Dip Card)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Healgen Secobarbital, Buprenorphine, and Methadone rapid lateral flow urine assays for qualitative drug detection.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative determination of Secobarbital (300 ng/mL), Buprenorphine (10 ng/mL), or Methadone (300 ng/mL) in human urine via immunochromatographic assay available in Strip, Cassette, Dip Card, and Cup formats for prescription and over-the-counter in vitro diagnostic use.
